sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.ITAMLicensingUtils</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>ITAMLicensingUtils</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var ITAMLicensingUtils = Class.create();
ITAMLicensingUtils.prototype = {
	initialize: function() {
		this.HAM_APP = 'Hardware Asset Management';
		this.ITAM_LICENSING_TABLE = 'itam_licensing_resource_counts';
		this.ITAM_ASSET_USAGE_TABLE = 'itam_asset_usage';
		this.ITAM_CI_USAGE_TABLE = 'itam_ci_usage';
		this.COMPUTERS_CATEGORY = 'end_user_computers';
		this.SERVERS_CATEGORY = 'servers';
		this.NETWORK_GEAR_CATEGORY = 'network_gear';
		this.validTables = [this.ITAM_LICENSING_TABLE,
			this.ITAM_ASSET_USAGE_TABLE,
			this.ITAM_CI_USAGE_TABLE];
	},
	isDomainSeparationEnabled: function() {
		return new global.AssetManagementBaseJob().fIsDomainDataSeparationEnabled;
	},
	deleteLicensingData: function(gr) {
		var index = this.validTables.indexOf(gr.getTableName());
		if (index >= 0) {
			gr.setWorkflow(false);
			gr.deleteMultiple();
		}
	},
	type: 'ITAMLicensingUtils',
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-06-05 09:55:59</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>24d10118c7911010f74c784c95c260a7</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>ITAMLicensingUtils</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Asset Management" source="com.snc.asset_management">3e467ca03cb1311068bcf327dfe37f49</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>protected</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_24d10118c7911010f74c784c95c260a7</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-06-05 09:56:05</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
